title: Final Space
resume: An astronaut named Gary and his planet-destroying sidekick Mooncake embark on serialized journeys through space in order to unlock the mystery of “Final Space,” the last point in the universe, if it actually does exist.

View All Seasons Social Reviews  1 Discussions  0 A review by Dsnake1  9.0 Written by  Dsnake1  on May  8, 2018 I've been waiting for Final Space for quite some time. I loved the pilot on the creator's YouTube channel, and I knew it could be great. Overall, I think Final Space fulfilled expectations.  Season 1 was full of introductions, but in ten 22-minute episodes, they managed to tell a story worth telling  and  make me feel for the characters. There were legitimately sad moments in this animated comedy, which isn't something that can always be said about these types of shows. Olan Rogers, the creator, did a fantastic job of teasing out emotions while still filling the show with the comedy he's kno...  read the rest.
